text: Wow, what an experience! I've never stayed in a cave before, so I was a little unprepared. Luckily, this listing had all the amenities I needed to feel safe and prepared for anything. Seriously, great experience. Giving 4 stars because the flies kept coming in at night through a hole in the cave mesh entrance.
100% enjoyed the wilderness experience. Do not book if you are not an adventurer and lover of the outdoors.

I thought this was going to be a cozy cave, but I was sorely disappointed. The mattress was hard, I could feel stones digging into my back. And it was COLD. They need to be more clear about this on the description.

The COOLEST yurt I've ever been in!!! Check it out, you won't regret it. The force shield is next level, we had a meteor shower come in the last night and besides a few rumbles, you couldn't even tell!
Meh, could be better honestly. I was expecting more. The lake was the only good part.
Description was accurate. It was indeed a cave campsite in the snowy part of the planet. Exactly what I needed.
I had a really long stay in Origae-6 for a work trip. The pod was small, but it had all I needed. Although I was starting to get space-crazy by the last week, I managed to survive.
